name: Pay Review
description: PayReview was born with the sole intent of enabling companies to generate insights and automates the compensation review & increment process. Our founding team observed that thousands of companies across the world were still spending hundreds of man-hours each year in managing & controlling compensation management using the traditional paper and pen approach, at most excel. This manual approach seldom yielded desired results and resulted in inconsistent and misaligned activities, inefficiency and arbitrary compensation decisions. The meticulous processes not only lead to inefficient cost allocation but results in serious talent attraction and retention challenges.They realized a need to conceive an inbuilt intelligence and automation solution that will work as an agent of change and help in revolutionizing the HR Industry.
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: PayReview Your decision support system right pay, right insights, right now
ShortDescription: PayReview's Intelligent Employee compensation & benefits management software enables seamless salary review and benchmarking.
enhanced_description: PayReview is an intelligent compensation and benefits management software designed to automate and streamline the entire compensation review and increment process. It functions as a decision support system, generating critical insights to help companies make data-driven, consistent, and efficient compensation decisions. By replacing traditional manual methods (paper and excel), PayReview addresses common challenges like inconsistent compensation, inefficient cost allocation, and arbitrary decisions, ultimately aiming to improve talent attraction and retention. The solution enables seamless salary review and benchmarking.
key_use_cases: Automating compensation review and increment processes
Providing decision support for compensation strategies
competitive_advantages: Improved consistency and alignment in compensation activities
Aids in overcoming talent attraction and retention challenges
Acts as a comprehensive decision support system for compensation
roi_benefits: Reduction in man-hours spent on compensation management
Elimination of inconsistent and misaligned compensation activities
More efficient cost allocation for compensation
Reduction in the cost of hiring qualified employees
